00104             function                object_exists( $id )
00105             {
00106                   try
00107                   {
00108                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00109                         
00110                         $Records = $this->ReviewAccess->unsafe_select( $this->ReviewAccess->NativeTable.".id = $id" );
00111                         
00112                         return( count( $Records ) === 1 );
00113                   }
00114                   catch( Exception $e )
00115                   {
00116                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00142             function                get_by_id( $id )
00143             {
00144                   try
00145                   {
00146                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00147                         
00148                         $Records = $this->ReviewAccess->unsafe_select( $this->ReviewAccess->NativeTable.".id = $id" );
00149                         
00150                         if( count( $Records ) == 0 )
00151                         {
00152                               throw( new Exception( 'Record was not found' ) );
00153                         }
00154                         
00155                         return( $Records[ 0 ] );
00156                   }
00157                   catch( Exception $e )
00158                   {
00159                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00160                   }

00189             function                get_records_for_object( $MasterId , $MasterType )
00190             {
00191                   try
00192                   {
00193                         if( isset( $this->Cache[ "$MasterId.$MasterType" ] ) )
00194                         {
00195                               return( $this->Cache[ "$MasterId.$MasterType" ] );
00196                         }
00197                         
00198                         $this->Cache[ "$MasterId.$MasterType" ] = $this->Link->get_dependent_objects( 
00199                               $MasterId , $MasterType , 'review' , $this->ReviewAccess
00200                         );
00201                         
00202                         return( $this->Cache[ "$MasterId.$MasterType" ] );
00203                   }
00204                   catch( Exception $e )
00205                   {
00206                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00207                   }
00208             }

00236             function                review_creation_allowed( $MasterId , $MasterType )
00237             {
00238                   try
00239                   {
00240                         $Reviews = $this->get_records_for_object( $MasterId , $MasterType );
00241                         $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_user();
00242                         $UserId = get_field( $User , 'id' );
00243                         
00244                         foreach( $Reviews as $i=> $Review )
00245                         {
00246                               if( get_field( $Review , 'author' ) == $UserId )
00247                               {
00248                                     return( false );
00249                               }
00250                         }
00251                         
00252                         $Registered = get_field( $User , 'registered' );
00253                         if( $Registered + 3 * 30 * 24 * 3600 > time() )
00254                         {
00255                               return( false );
00256                         }
00257                         
00258                         return( true );
00259                   }
00260                   catch( Exception $e )
00261                   {
00262                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00263                   }
00264             }
00265             
00292             function                create( &$Record , &$Options )
00293             {
00294                   try
00295                   {
00296                         $MasterId = $Options->get_setting( 'master_id' );
00297                         $MasterType = $Options->get_setting( 'master_type' );
00298                         
00299                         if( $this->review_creation_allowed( $MasterId , $MasterType ) )
00300                         {
00301                               return( $this->ReviewAccess->create( $Record ) );
00302                         }
00303                   }
00304                   catch( Exception $e )
00305                   {
00306                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00307                   }
00308             }
